rows.label: bf03080100_0010
rows.name: There's some kinda dim light...

rows.label: bf03080100_0020
rows.name: The Invidan Divine Beast's hide on it's back is translucent.

rows.label: bf03080100_0030
rows.name: I bet that'll be the light filtering through.

rows.label: bf03080100_0040
rows.name: So the Divine Beast must be above the clouds now?

rows.label: bf03080100_0050
rows.name: I dare say!

rows.label: bf03080100_0060
rows.name:
If we can make it to the source of the light,
maybe we'll find a way out of here.

rows.label: bf03080100_0070
rows.name: Hold it!

rows.label: bf03080100_0080
rows.name: Looks like a bunch of mushes I ain't seen yet.

rows.label: bf03080100_0090
rows.name:
What?
Did you get swallowed by the Divine Beast while drifting across the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: bf03080100_0100
rows.name: ...Huh? That Blade...

rows.label: bf03080100_0110
rows.name: An emerald Core Crystal!

rows.label: bf03080100_0120
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*gasp*

rows.label: bf03080100_0130
rows.name:
Bwahahahaha!
So the rumors are true!

rows.label: bf03080100_0140
rows.name: Huh? What rumors?

rows.label: bf03080100_0150
rows.name:
The tale that every Driver worth his salt knows.
The legendary Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf03080100_0160
rows.name:
Folks been saying she just woke up from
a 500 year nap.

rows.label: bf03080100_0170
rows.name:
Wouldn't have thought she'd show up with a
pencil-neck shrimp like you for a Driver, though.

rows.label: bf03080100_0180
rows.name: You think I don't have what it takes?

rows.label: bf03080100_0190
rows.name:
Nah, I mean...
Maybe you could handle a normal Blade.

rows.label: bf03080100_0200
rows.name:
But that one is anything but normal.
You're too much of a greenhorn.

rows.label: bf03080100_0210
rows.name: C'mon boy. Hand her over.

rows.label: bf03080100_0220
rows.name: This crap is getting old.

rows.label: bf03080100_0230
rows.name: Leave her alone!

rows.label: bf03080100_0240
rows.name: Y'got heart, kid. I like that.

rows.label: bf03080100_0250
rows.name:
Yuu, Zuo, you take care of the others.
I wanna squash the kid.

rows.label: bf03080100_0260
rows.name: Heheh. Leave it to us, boss.

rows.label: bf03080100_0270
rows.name: We'll take real good care of 'em.
